document.full_text: the european financial stability facility (efsf) rescue fund is ready to help portugal if needed, klaus regling, the fund's president told la tribune in an interview published online on saturday.
document.title: europe rescue fund says ready to help portugal - report
lines_and_colors: the european financial stability facility (efsf) rescue fund is ready to help portugal if needed, klaus regling, the fund's president told la tribune in an interview published online on saturday.
